node.title: I hope to spend this Christmas:
node.author: marto

data.field: With Family. With Friends. Alone. Partying in pubs/clubs. Watching [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0039628|some] [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0038650/|traditional] [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0096061/|Christmas] [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0095016/|films]. By the fire with a book. Playing computer games. Working :( Hacking :) Being visited by [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Christmas_Carol|four ghosts]. A selection of the above. Something else.
